text.section: This section applies only in Montgomery County.

The subdivision regulations may:
establish a time period within which the county planning board shall approve or disapprove a preapplication or preliminary plan submission; and
provide that an applicant may:
waive the time period within which the county planning board shall take action in accordance with item (1) of this subsection; and
consent to an extension of the time period.

section.section: A preapplication or preliminary plan submission that has not been approved or disapproved in accordance with this section is considered approved.
If a preapplication or preliminary plan submission is considered to have been approved under this subsection, on demand, the county planning board shall issue a certificate of approval.

text.section:
If the county planning board disapproves a preapplication or preliminary plan submission, the county planning board shall:
state the grounds for disapproval in the records of the county planning board; and
mail, postage prepaid, a copy of the record stating the grounds for disapproval to all parties of record at their last address.
